r.s: The source code for the PEAR website
r.n: * fix release upload: don't let custom non-pear built packages with no package.xml in root dir slip through the cracks * fix .xsd for REST1.2 * fix Bug #10183: roadmap link to bug tracker needs &cmd=display * fix Bug #10212: if multiple roadmaps exist, assigning bugs to one may overwrite the other * implement Request #9973: Add a "developing with PEAR effectively" document to the site * implement Request #10150: Allow "future" roadmap versions * implement Request #10176: patch tracker for bugs * implement Request #10179: implement package.xml generation with auto-changelog from roadmap * implement Request #10180: require account to open/edit bugs, use auto-email verification like pear.voter * implement Request #10197: add PHP version and API version to release REST
